DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Output Duplex Sonography Carotid Endarterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator investigate difference cardiac output cerebral blood-flow regional anesthesia ( RA ) general anesthesia ( GA ) randomize , control , single center study Medical University Innsbruck , Department Anesthesia Intensive Care Medicine . For purpose patient need carotid endarterectomy ( CEA ) include randomize either regional anesthesia ( RA ) general anesthesia ( GA ) group patient number 45 group achieve . The cardiac output cerebral blood-flow via trans-cranial Doppler ( TCD ) measure 6 time point : - T0 Baseline ( insertion arterial line ) - T1 After induction anesthesia , surgical start - T2 Two minute clamp carotid artery - T3 Two minute shunt insertation carotid artery - T4 After reperfusion - T5 After completion skin suture
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > = 18 year 2 . Elective carotid endarterectomy 3 . Signed informed consent 1 . Age 18 year 2 . Missing sign inform consent
